translation.en: But... for the sake of the future of this company,
translation.fr: Mais, pour protéger l'avenir de cette société,

translation.en: We have no choice but to consider Mr. Pascal's offer.
translation.fr: nous n'avons pas d'autre choix que de considérer l'offre de M. Pascal.

translation.en: Who said you don't have a choice?
translation.fr: Qui dit qu'on n'a pas le choix ?

translation.en: We have a choice. Look... And we have just one choice,
translation.fr: On a le choix. Et on n'a qu'un seul choix,

translation.en: - reject his proposal. - No.
translation.fr: - celui de rejeter cette offre. - Non.

translation.en: - Refuse his offer. - No!
Please, look, if this company falls into the hands of Igwe Pascal,
translation.fr: Écoutez, si cette société tombe dans les mains d'Igwe Pascal,

translation.en: I can assure you it will be a shadow of itself.
translation.fr: je vous assure qu'elle ne sera plus que l'ombre d'elle-même.

translation.en: Lionheart will not be the company as you know it today.
translation.fr: Lionheart ne sera plus la société qu'elle est aujourd'hui.

translation.en: Yes.
So, please give us a chance to make things right, please.
translation.fr: Alors, je vous en prie, laissez-nous arranger les choses.

translation.en: Please.
Igwe gave you ten days, Igwe Pascal.
translation.fr: Igwe vous a donné dix jours, Igwe Pascal.

translation.en: - Take ten days. - Yes.
- Ten days is okay. - That's okay.
translation.fr: - Va pour dix jours. - C'est d'accord.

translation.en: - No, Chief, even ten days will-- - We'll take it.
translation.fr: - Non, chef. Même dix jours... - Ça marche.

translation.en: - Ten days? - I think is rather impromptu--
translation.fr: - Dix jours ? - Je trouve ça plutôt impulsif...

translation.en: And, sorry, but in the foreseeable future, gentlemen...
translation.fr: Et, désolé, mais dans un futur proche, messieurs...

translation.en: So...
You don't have to be moody at all. You have...
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à te sentir mal. Tu as...

translation.en: You have done the best any woman, any man can do.
translation.fr: Tu as fait le maximum qu'une femme, ou un homme, pouvait faire.

translation.en: In fact, what you need now is rest.
translation.fr: Au fait, ce qu'il te faut là, c'est du repos.

translation.en: Rest? Uncle, this is not the time to rest.
translation.fr: Du repos ? Tonton, on n'a pas le temps pour le repos.

translation.en: - Why? - Igwe Pascal is a ruthless business man.
He doesn't care about Lionheart, or its people, just its assets.
translation.fr: Il se fout de Lionheart et ses employés. Il est après son actif.

translation.en: If that man becomes the owner of this company,
translation.fr: Si cet homme rachète cette société,

translation.en: many people will lose their jobs, I can assure you.
translation.fr: beaucoup perdraient leurs emplois, je le garantis.

translation.en: God Forbid!
He cannot be. That's number one.
translation.fr: Il ne le fera pas. C'est la priorité.

translation.en: - What would the families begin to do? - Exactly.
You know you were telling me about your plans.
translation.fr: Tu m'as parlé de tes plans.

translation.en: I want to know all your plans, now.
translation.fr: Je veux tout savoir de ces plans.

translation.en: I assume that this one is plan one.
translation.fr: Ceci doit être le premier plan.

translation.en: Well, I was hoping that the BRT contract would go through.
translation.fr: J'espérais qu'on décrocherait le contrat BHNS.

translation.en: Actually I'm very positive it--
Ada- nna, the BRT is like a a corporate job. It can't be relied on.
translation.fr: Ada-nna, on ne peut pas comparer le BHNS à un emploi. Il n'est pas sûr.

translation.en: It can go away at any time.
translation.fr: Il peut disparaitre à tout moment.

translation.en: Just like marriages of the past...
translation.fr: Tout comme les mariages du passé...

translation.en: where the woman is idle and eats up the wealth of the man.
translation.fr: où la femme ne fait rien et consomme les richesses de l'homme.

translation.en: Unlike what is obtainable now.
Anyway, you might not understand what I'm saying.
translation.fr: Tu ne vois peut-être pas ce que je dis.

translation.en: No, I understand fully, uncle.
That's why I work hard for my money. I'm not here to depend on any man to--
translation.fr: C'est pourquoi je travaille dur. Je ne veux dépendre d'aucun...

translation.en: Don't get angry, I didn't mean it that way.
translation.fr: T'énerve pas. Je ne le pensais pas.

translation.en: I'm not getting angry but I've dated men that...
translation.fr: Je ne m'énerve pas. Je suis sortie avec des mecs...

translation.en: You've dated men that did what?
Did anyone hurt you?
Talk to me, I'm your uncle.
- You have dated men that-- - No, thanks, uncle.
But…
I think I know a man we can rely on.
translation.fr: Je connais un mec sur qui on peut compter.

translation.en: Are you sure?
Arinze!
Who is Arinze?
Excuse me.
Excuse me. Sorry, where's Arinze?
Thank you.
Uncle?
You know what, you can just wait here. I'll be back.
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi, attends-moi ici. Je reviens.

translation.en: - No, let me go with you. - No, it's fine.
translation.fr: - Non, je viens. - Non, ça ira.

translation.en: - He's alright. It will only take a minute. - Really?
- Yes. - Okay. Are you sure you'll be safe?
translation.fr: - Oui. - Tu es sûre que tu ne risques rien ?

translation.en: Hello, how are you?
I'm alright.
- Hey! - Hey.
What a pleasant surprise.
- Hi. - Look at you.
I and my partner, we can supply you with all the vehicles you need.
translation.fr: Mon associé et moi pouvons nous fournir tous les véhicules qu'il vous faut.

translation.en: This is our inventory. You can go through it.
translation.fr: Voici notre inventaire. Vous pouvez l'examiner.

translation.en: All the model numbers are there.
translation.fr: Tous les numéros de modèles y sont.

translation.en: We can supply to you
only if you can pay that 30% deposit.
translation.fr: une fois que vous aurez payé l'acompte de 30 %.

translation.en: Okay.
- Well, how is your dad? - Yeah...
- Hope he's recovering? - Oh, he's much better. Thank you.
translation.fr: - Il se rétablit, j'espère. - Il va mieux. Merci.

translation.en: Thank God.
Okay, I won't, uh, take much of your time so you can get back to your stuff.
translation.fr: D'accord. Je ne vous retiendrai pas longtemps.

translation.en: Lionheart is in trouble.
Yeah.
And I need a loan.
Please can you tell him to hurry up. I want to buy myself a new car.
translation.fr: Dites-lui de se dépêcher. Je veux m'acheter une nouvelle voiture.

translation.en: He should pay up fast.
I'm not playing here. I'm a hustler.
translation.fr: Je ne joue pas ici. Je suis un arnaqueur.

translation.en: What did he say?
Oh, he was saying that...
you have a sense of business, he likes your personality.
translation.fr: vous avez le sens des affaires, il aime votre personnalité.

translation.en: - Ah, thank you, sir. - That you have an eye for good business.
translation.fr: - Ah, merci, monsieur. - Que vous avez l’œil pour les affaires.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate it.
We are in debt of 950 million.
Yeah. I'm hoping to raise at least a third of it,
translation.fr: J'espérais collecter le tiers de la somme, au moins.

translation.en: and if I'm able to get that, then--
I will give you 500.
What?
You heard me right.
I will give you 500.
You have 500 million just lying about Arinze, really?
translation.fr: Tu as 500 millions de côté, Arinze ? Vraiment ?

translation.en: Not really, but I can always work things out.
translation.fr: Pas vraiment, mais je peux toujours me débrouiller.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Of course, I'm very serious.
30% is a little over 100 million.
Sounds too good to be true. I don't know.
translation.fr: Ça parait trop beau pour être vrai. Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: It's not like that, I'm just doing just a giveaway,
translation.fr: C'est pas comme ça. C'est une sorte de cadeau

translation.en: because this is my first business with you.
translation.fr: parce que c'est ma première affaire avec vous.

translation.en: You need to be mindful of the money so we know our share.
translation.fr: Fais attention avec l'argent pour qu'on connaisse notre part.

translation.en: Remember Arinze has a cut.
I'm aware. If I had known, I would have added more money.
translation.fr: Je sais. J'aurais ajouté de l'argent si je l'avais su.

translation.en: Because he's a nice man. That's why I'm giving it to him.
translation.fr: Parce qu'il est un homme bien. C'est pour ça que je le fais.

translation.en: That's giving a good price. You understand?
translation.fr: C'est un bon prix. Vous voyez ?

translation.en: Once he pays...
Hey!
Arinze! My God. Thank you!
Thank you. I promise you I will pay back every penny.
translation.fr: Merci ! Je promets de tout rembourser.

translation.en: - There is this contract that we're-- - Ada.
translation.fr: - Il y a ce contrat qu'on a... - Ada.

translation.en: Ada, be cool. Enough of all this business talk.
translation.fr: Ada, ne t'en fais pas. On a assez parlé affaires.

translation.en: What would you like to drink?
translation.fr: Je t'offre quelque chose à boire ?

translation.en: No, I have to go back to the office, I'm on duty so--
translation.fr: Non, je dois retourner au bureau. Je suis de service...

translation.en: Like, seriously, you go to work like this.
translation.fr: Sérieusement, tu vas au boulot comme ça.

translation.en: This is, this is a long story. Don't even ask.
translation.fr: C'est une longue histoire. N'en parlons pas.

translation.en: Now you look so tense.
Arinze I'm not, I'm not tense. I'm...
translation.fr: Arinze, je ne suis pas tendue.

translation.en: You are tense.
I'm not tense.
You're not?
I don't know you, but if you like your life, you leave now.
translation.fr: Je ne vous connais pas, mais si vous tenez à la vie, partez tout de suite.

translation.en: I don't... What are you talking about?
translation.fr: Je ne... De quoi vous parlez ?

translation.en: These people are not what you think they are.
translation.fr: Ces gens ne sont pas qui ils prétendent être.

translation.en: They are swind-- What do you call shit at your place?
translation.fr: C'est des arna... Comment dit-on merde chez vous ?

translation.en: These are two pieces of kashi. Very bad ones.
translation.fr: Vous avez là deux gros kashis.

translation.en: The are swindlers. They are here to... I was here, listening to them in Igbo.
translation.fr: C'est des escrocs. Ils sont là pour... Je les ai entendus parler en Igbo.

translation.en: You don't understand Igbo. So they are playing you in Igbo.
translation.fr: Vous ne parlez pas Igbo. Ils se jouent de vous en Igbo.

translation.en: - You know what? - Hm?
I think I have something to get you more relaxed.
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose pour te détendre.

translation.en: Like, like what?
Wait. I'm coming.
Arinze?
- Don't listen to this man. - Sorry.
- You can see this man is drunk. - No, no.
translation.fr: - Il est ivre, c'est évident. - Non.

translation.en: - Let's do... We can do this business. - No.
Save your life. Save your money.
Mr. Hamza. Please, just hold on.
- We can do this business. - No, no.
Look at what you are doing, all this stupid business.
translation.fr: Regardez ce que vous faites, toutes ces affaires stupides.

translation.en: Tarnishing the image of the Igbo people.
Why don't you go to the secretariat and look for a job?
Change your clothes and go into farming.
Agriculture is thriving right now.
Go and farm. You are painting us black. Aren't you ashamed?
translation.fr: Allez travailler la terre. Vous nous faites honte.

translation.en: No, no. no.
Where are you going?
Where are you going? Have you become a security man?
translation.fr: Vous êtes chargé de la sécurité ? Vous partez après avoir gâché nos marché ?

translation.en: You want to run away after disrupting our deal?
translation.fr: Vous partez après avoir gâché nos marché ?

translation.en: Let me tell you...
We are all Igbo people.
translation.fr: On est tous des Igbos ici.

translation.en: So, Ada...
Ada?
You will have to pay us 30% of the money.
translation.fr: Tu vas devoir nous payer 30 % du total.

translation.en: Really?
Yes. You hit him well.
- Ada- nna. - Uncle, we need to go.
Yeah, good idea.
Remain on the ground. Stupid man.
Director.
Hello, sir, good afternoon.
I was just coming to see you. Did you get my e- mails?
translation.fr: Je venais vous voir. Avez-vous reçu mes emails ?

translation.en: - Yes, yes I did. - Okay.
translation.fr: - Oui, je les ai reçus. - D'accord.

translation.en: But unfortunately,
there's little I can do right now.
translation.fr: je ne peux pas faire grand chose.

translation.en: The EFCC is investigating us as we speak.
translation.fr: L'EFCC enquête sur nous en ce moment.

translation.en: The Perm Sec has been placed on compulsory leave,
translation.fr: Le Secrétaire général est en congé forcé,

translation.en: and between you and me, he's not coming back.
translation.fr: et entre nous, il ne reviendra pas.

translation.en: So, as it stands now,
I don't have idea of the fate of the BRT project.
translation.fr: j'ignore le sort du projet des BHNS.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
It's only God that can save us from this mess.
translation.fr: Seul Dieu peut nous sauver de ce chaos.

translation.en: Thank you.
Madam, I'm very sorry.
My apologies to your father.
This is the change we all believe in.
translation.fr: On est convaincus que ce changement est nécessaire.

translation.en: Good morning, Ma.
Hello. Onyinye?
Is anything wrong?
She didn't come to work?
Leave me alone.
I'm not hungry.
My friend, I'm coming in.
Mummy?
Yes, dear.
I heard you didn't go to work.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas allée au bureau.

translation.en: I'm not feeling well.
You're not feeling well.
Onyinye called me.
I'm so tired, mummy.
I'm exhausted.
What is really the problem?
I can't get an extension on the loans.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas reporter le délai des prêts.

translation.en: BRT contract is not forthcoming.
translation.fr: Le contrat BHNS se présente mal.

translation.en: And if this... Igwe Pascal man gets a hold of our company,
translation.fr: Et si Igwe Pascal s'empare de notre société,

translation.en: everyone will lose their jobs.
And they are depending on me, and I feel like I'm failing.
translation.fr: Ils comptent sur moi et je n'y arrive pas.

translation.en: You have not started and you feel like such a failure?
translation.fr: Tu n'as même pas commencé et tu n'y arrives déjà pas ?

translation.en: Do you know what your father put into setting up this company?
translation.fr: Sais-tu ce que cette société a coûté à ton père ?

translation.en: The challenges, the mistakes, the failures he had to face?
translation.fr: Les défis, les erreurs, les échecs par lesquels il est passé ?

translation.en: And yet he made it.
What is it they say?
It's not over till it's over.
translation.fr: C'est pas fini tant que c'est pas fini.

translation.en: Yes but, mummy, I'm running out of ideas. I don't know what to do.
translation.fr: Oui, mais maman, je suis à court d'idées. Je ne sais quoi faire.

translation.en: God never gives you a burden he has not equipped you to carry.
translation.fr: Dieu ne donne jamais de fardeau qu'on ne puisse porter.

translation.en: What should I do?
What can I do?
You have your father's business brains. You're a businesswoman.
translation.fr: Tu as le cerveau commercial de ton père. Tu es une femme d'affaires.

translation.en: Do away with the sentiments and the emotions.
translation.fr: Libère-toi des sentiments et des émotions.

translation.en: And get the job done. You have it in you.
translation.fr: Et fais ce que tu as à faire. Tu l'as en toi.

translation.en: Dig deep and get it.
You've always been able to do anything you put your mind to.
translation.fr: Tu as toujours pu faire ce que tu voulais.

translation.en: You can do this.
Thank you, mummy.
You can do this, you're gonna be alright.
translation.fr: Tu peux le faire, tu vas t'en sortir.

translation.en: Listen, get dressed, come to the house
translation.fr: Va te changer et viens à la maison

translation.en: and let's have a nice meal.
Your auntie Chioma is around and she's been asking for you.
translation.fr: Ta tante Chioma est là et elle demande à te voir.

translation.en: - She is? - Yeah.
She came to see her husband. You know those two,
translation.fr: Elle est venue voir son mari. Ces deux-là,

translation.en: they never stay away from each other for too long.
translation.fr: ils ne peuvent pas rester séparés longtemps.

translation.en: Come on, get dressed.
- Okay, I'll see you there. - Alright.
Good evening.
- Oh, Ada- nna. - Aunty.
Ada... You are looking beautiful.
What?
She looks tiny. Are you people feeding her?
translation.fr: Elle est maigre. Vous la nourrissez ?

translation.en: Can't you see food everywhere? You ask if she is being fed.
translation.fr: Tu vois de la nourriture partout et tu demandes ça ?

translation.en: Don't allow your father and uncle to tear you apart.
translation.fr: Ne laisse pas ton père et ton oncle te surmener.

translation.en: Take it easy.
Please don't blame anybody. She goes to the gym.
translation.fr: Ne blâme personne. Elle fait du sport.

translation.en: Gym?
Fashion. That's the trend these days.
translation.fr: C'est à la mode ces jours-ci.

translation.en: Fitness.
I heard the first daughter of John Bosco
translation.fr: J'ai entendu que l’aînée de John Bosco

translation.en: is getting married next month.
John Bosco looked at his son- in- law
translation.fr: John Bosco a regardé son futur beau-fils

translation.en: and felt he looked really skinny.
He then asked him,
Can you take care of my daughter looking this way?
translation.fr: Pouvez-vous prendre soin de ma fille en étant si maigre ?

translation.en: He replied,
My in- law, it is all in God's hands.
translation.fr: Beau-père, tout est entre les mains de Dieu.

translation.en: John Bosco replied, I have heard you.
translation.fr: John Bosco a répondu : Je vois.

translation.en: Let me tell you the truth…
You don't understand what the son- in- law meant...
translation.fr: tu n'as pas compris ce que le beau-fils voulait dire.

translation.en: The God he was referring to, was John Bosco.
translation.fr: Le Dieu dont il parlait est John Bosco.

translation.en: He will call him God- John Bosco if you let him.
translation.fr: Il l'appellerait Dieu John Bosco s'il pouvait.

translation.en: It's not a lie.
That's young men of today.
translation.fr: C'est les jeunes de nos jours.

translation.en: Saying it is in the hands of God implies it is in the hands of John Bosco.
translation.fr: Par les mains de Dieu, il entend celles de John Bosco.

translation.en: John Bosco is God.
Let me tell you, that's what we suffer nowadays.
When a young man wants to marry...
translation.fr: c'est le dilemme de nos jours.

translation.en: he'll first ask around if the parents are wealthy.
translation.fr: Quand un jeune homme veut se marier... il se renseigne d'abord si les parents sont riches.

translation.en: If both the parents are not wealthy, he disappears.
translation.fr: Si les parents sont pauvres, il se barre. Il disparaît.

translation.en: He's gone.
My sister, it is just tiring. It's too much.
translation.fr: C'est fatiguant, ma sœur. C'est trop.

translation.en: That's how a child will carry on something too heavy to handle.
translation.fr: Un enfant porte un fardeau trop lourd de cette manière.

translation.en: My dear, if such a man comes for you... run!
translation.fr: Ma chère, si un homme pareil t'approche, cours !

translation.en: Make sure your feet hit your ears as you run.
translation.fr: Prends tes jambes à ton cou.

translation.en: It is not that you see a man and start running...
translation.fr: Ne cours pas dès que tu vois un homme...

translation.en: because you might be in this sort of race and run past your future husband...
translation.fr: parce que tu pourrais rater ton futur époux dans ta course...

translation.en: then, we won't get to drink on your wedding day.
translation.fr: et on ne pourra pas boire à ton mariage.

translation.en: How it is done is that, first, you study the man...
translation.fr: Il faut commencer par étudier l'homme...

translation.en: if he is a reasonable person, you accept him.
translation.fr: Il faut commencer par étudier l'homme... s'il est responsable, tu l'acceptes.

translation.en: But if it's any of those men that sag their trousers to their knees...
translation.fr: Mais s'il est un de ces hommes qui portent leurs pantalons à leurs genoux...

translation.en: Run!
Because these children feel like they are of marriageable age...
translation.fr: Parce que ces gamins pensent qu'ils ont l'âge de se marier...

translation.en: If a child tried to tie a wrapper before maturity, when the wind comes--
translation.fr: Si un enfant tentait de rouler une cigarette avant d'être mature,

translation.en: It will blow him away along with the wrapper.
translation.fr: le vent l'emporterait lui et son papier à cigarette.

translation.en: Obiora, you have heard what they said. What do you want to do with your life?
translation.fr: Obiora, tu as entendu ce qu'ils ont dit. Que veux-tu faire de ta vie ?

translation.en: What sort of question is that?  He asked you a question.
translation.fr: - C'est quoi cette question ? - Il t'a posé une question.

translation.en: So the music I am into isn't beneficial to my life?
translation.fr: La musique que j'aime n'est pas bien pour moi ?

translation.en: I'm a musician. You've always known this is what I do.
translation.fr: Je suis un musicien. Tu l'as toujours su.

translation.en: Music is your choice of profession?
You know you are Igbo?
translation.fr: Tu sais que tu es un Igbo ?

translation.en: Essentially, every day you move around with an instrument
translation.fr: Donc, chaque jour, tu te balades avec un instrument

translation.en: all in the name of music?
Was Osadebe not an Igbo man?
Is it not his music you always play in this house?
translation.fr: C'est pas sa musique que tu écoutes ici ?

translation.en: Chief, he got you there!
You win.
You win, before I choke.
At least I have not gone to jail like Ada and Uncle Goddy.
translation.fr: Au moins, je suis pas allé en prison comme Ada et oncle Goddy.

translation.en: Leave me out of it.
you cannot go to jail.
translation.fr: la prison n'est pas pour toi.

translation.en: You look like a new baby's bath water.
translation.fr: Tu as l'air de l'eau de bain d'un nouveau né.

translation.en: If you go to jail, will you come out alive?
translation.fr: Tu ne survivrais pas en prison.

translation.en: See your beard looking like that of Nebuchadnezzar.
translation.fr: Avec ta barbe, on dirait Nebuchadnezzar.

translation.en: It will be the first thing they shave with a bottle.
translation.fr: Ils raseront ça en premier, avec une bouteille.

translation.en: At least I look like my father with the beard.
translation.fr: Je ressemble au moins à papa avec la barbe.

translation.en: You know I support you, but I'm just telling you the truth.
translation.fr: Je suis de ton côté, mais je tiens à dire la vérité.

translation.en: Are you saying I don't work hard?
translation.fr: Tu dis que je ne travaille pas dur ?

translation.en: Please, let's eat, before I choke on pepper.
translation.fr: Allez, mangeons avant que je m'étouffe avec le piment.

translation.en: Hi daddy.
Ada, how are you?
I'm good.
How are you?
Well, I am grateful to God for my life.
translation.fr: Je suis reconnaissant pour ma vie.

translation.en: But you see there comes a time in the life of a man
translation.fr: Mais, tu vois, il y a un moment dans la vie

translation.en: when he decides to take stock.
translation.fr: où on décide de faire le point.

translation.en: I've come to realize that most men invest all their time
translation.fr: J'ai compris que la plupart des hommes investissent leur temps

translation.en: in matters of transient value,
translation.fr: dans des choses à valeur passagère,

translation.en: at the expense of what they should cherish,
translation.fr: aux dépens de ce qu'ils doivent chérir,

translation.en: what they should value,
like love,
life,
family.
I waited eight years for you to be born.
translation.fr: J'ai attendu ta naissance pendant huit ans.

translation.en: Those were years of trepidation.
And you came and you became a source of pride and joy to me.
translation.fr: Quand tu es arrivée, tu es devenue une source de fierté et de joie pour moi.

translation.en: I have watched you grow,
and I'm so confident in your ability.
translation.fr: et je suis si convaincu de tes capacités.

translation.en: The biggest legacy...
I would leave for posterity...
translation.fr: que je laisserai à la postérité...

translation.en: is you.
My daughter.
I'm not thinking about death, but...
translation.fr: Je ne pense pas à la mort, mais...

translation.en: Marie Connely said, In the midst of life we are in death,
translation.fr: Marie Connely a dit : Au cœur de la vie, la mort nous attend,

translation.en: so occasionally when we talk about life, there's always death hovering around.
translation.fr: donc parfois quand on parle de la vie, la mort est toujours sous-entendue.

translation.en: You are the pendulum of my life.
translation.fr: Tu es le pendule de ma vie.
